00001 #include <cppunit/extensions/HelperMacros.h>
00002 #include <TCPSocket.h>
00003 
00004 #include <cstring>
00005 
00006 static const char send_msg[] = "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog";
00007 static char recv_msg[sizeof(send_msg)];
00008 static const int len = sizeof(send_msg);
00009 
00010 class TCPSocket_TEST : public CppUnit::TestFixture
00011 {
00012     CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE( TCPSocket_TEST );
00013     CPPUNIT_TEST( testSocketHandle );
00014     CPPUNIT_TEST( testPeerStatus );
00015     CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00016 
00017 private:
00018     NET::TCPSocket* server_socket;
00019     NET::TCPSocket* client_socket;
00020 
00021 public:
00022     void setUp()
00023     {
00024         server_socket = new NET::TCPSocket();
00025         client_socket = new NET::TCPSocket();
00026     }
00027 
00028     void tearDown()
00029     {
00030         delete server_socket;
00031         delete client_socket;
00032     }
00033 
00034     void testSocketHandle()
00035     {
00036         server_socket->bind( "127.0.0.1", 47777);
00037         server_socket->listen();
00038         client_socket->connect( "127.0.0.1", 47777);
00039 
00040         NET::TCPSocket::Handle tmp_handle = server_socket->accept();
00041         NET::TCPSocket::Handle handle;
00042         NET::TCPSocket::Handle& ref_handle = handle;
00043         handle = ref_handle;
00044         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( !handle );
00045         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( tmp_handle );
00046         handle = tmp_handle;
00047         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( handle );
00048         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( !tmp_handle );
00049         NET::TCPSocket session_socket(handle);
00050         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( !handle );
00051         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW( NET::TCPSocket bad_socket(handle), NET::SocketException );
00052         client_socket->disconnect();
00053     }
00054 
00055     void testPeerStatus()
00056     {
00057         int ret;
00058         server_socket->bind( "127.0.0.1", 47777);
00059         server_socket->listen();
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( !server_socket->peerDisconnected() );
00061 
00062         client_socket->connect( "127.0.0.1", 47777);
00063         NET::TCPSocket::Handle handle = server_socket->accept();
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( handle );
00065         NET::TCPSocket session_socket(handle);
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( !handle );
00067 
00068         session_socket.send( send_msg, len);
00069         ret = client_socket->receive( recv_msg, len);
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL( len, ret );
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( !session_socket.peerDisconnected() );
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( std::memcmp( send_msg, recv_msg, len) == 0 );
00073 
00074         client_socket->disconnect();
00075         ret = session_socket.send( send_msg, len);
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL( -1, ret );
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( session_socket.peerDisconnected() );
00078     }
00079 };
00080
